Class CallCdrController

java.lang.Object
com.bytedesk.call.cdr.CallCdrController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/freeswitch/api/v1/cdr") @ConditionalOnProperty(name="bytedesk.call.freeswitch.enabled", havingValue="true") public class CallCdrController extends Object
